item: Tower acceptance post-erection inspection performed
Tower foundation as per drawings
Tower antenna feed bridge / cable trays as per drawings
RF and M/W antenna mounts installed as per Drawings.
Rooftop anchors as per Drawings
Site grounding as per design and secured from trip hazards
Transmission line & hangers installed properly (incl. two supports on MW flexes)
Weatherproofing & Hoisting Grips installed as per Network Standards
Cellular antennas installed per Final Cell Design
Microwave antennas installed as per Final TX Design and Design Drawings
Microwave lines are labelled / tagged with Brass tags (at MW, and shelter bulkhead)
RF cables are appropriately labelled in the shelter/cabinet
DC power cables labelled are appropriately labelled in the shelter/cabinet
Kick plates and waveguide boots installed and the ports sealed inside/outside
Interior building finishes as per drawings (walls, floors, receptacles, lighting)
Exterior building finishes as per drawings (stairs, doors, locks, walkway)
Compound fencing and gate complete as per drawings and grounded (2 corner posts)
Anchor fencing and gate complete as per drawings
Access road and compound complete and as per drawings
Rooftop shelter support frame as per drawings and grounded
Walls, Ceiling, and Floors clean
All garbage from Installation work removed from Site/Compound
LOC CODE on the shelter / cabinet door
Antenna, MW and Feeder sweeps left on site and/or forwarded to Rogers for review and inclusion in As-Built package
Fiber OTDR and Scope results left on site and/or forwarded to Rogers for review and inclusion in As-Built package
As builts ready for review
